title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Oakland, California
content:
Photo submitted byRich Cervania, “Oakland’s mural scene is hella quick! Picture taken morning of Sunday 1/31/21 on my way to the Oakland/Berkeley hills.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with […]

author: Kristi Benedict
